body.p: Adair County attorney. Cumberland County native. Graduated from Center College at Danville in 1862. Studied law under Thomas T. Alexander. Admitted to the bar 1863. Appointed master commissioner of the Adair Circuit Court in 1864. Married Dollie Mille Lise. Children included W. Lisle Baker, W.R. Walker, Tyler A. Baker, W.D. Jones, and Herschel T. Baker.
